metadata.description: Tests DECLARE_LOCAL opcode (0x41 / ActionDefineLocal2) - declares local variables in function scope without setting a value

implementation_notes: ActionDefineLocal2 (0x41) correctly declares local variables initialized to undefined
DefineFunction2 now creates a local scope object and pushes it onto scope_chain
Local variables properly shadow global variables of the same name

The basic functionality is fully implemented and working
